svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - April 11 2021

title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 11, 2021" date: "2021-04-12"
Eth News and Links
Mainnet
• Update your nodes before Berlin fork : Besu v21.1.4 , EthereumJS VM v5.3.1 , Geth v1.10.2 ,
Nethermind v1.10.56 , OpenEthereum v3.2 , Turbogeth 04.02 alpha
• Beam sync in 80 seconds using meta witnesses
• Stateless ideas: insertion-order Indexed Merkle Tries and Bayesian network model of Witness Creation
• Should storage be priced separately from execution?
EIPs/Standards
• ERC3473 : Multiple Callable Bonds Standard
• ERC3476 : Antitoken
Proof of Stake
• Latest eth2 call . Notes from Alex Stokes and Ben Edgington . Altair PoS upgrade targeted for
June/July
• Latest what’s new in eth2
• The goal is to turn off PoW in 2021
• The Rayonism spec v0.1 to turn off PoW and the meta-spec
• A simple approach to incentivizing shard staggering via checksum incentives
• Exactly how much can I make as a staker ? Pintail gets deep into the weeds
• Vitalik’s why sharding is great explainer
Layer2
• GodsUnchained launches ImmutableX zkrollup for free NFT transactions . Also running StarkEx: dydx
now out of beta with its cross-margined perpetuals zkrollup .
• StarkWare’s Caspian l2 AMM - batch transactions together and have one layer 1 net transaction.
Targeting June
• A prototype of ENS on Optimism with demo
• Celer’s layer2 finance is on Ropsten testnet with contest and incentives to test
• L2beat : tracking the traction of layer2
This newsletter is made possible thanks to 1inch Network !
The popular DeFi platform 1inch has expanded to the 1inch Network by creating multiple protocols,
products and teams, all based around the idea of providing instruments for users to maximize their
financial opportunities in DeFi.
Currently, the 1inch Network consists of five independent yet interoperable components. In addition to
the 1inch Aggregation Protocol and 1inch Liquidity Protocol, which are already admired in the DeFi
space, the other three components are the 1inch DAO, 1inch Labs and the 1inch Foundation. For more
info check the 1inch.io and follow the 1inch Network's official Twitter !
Stuff for developers
• Understanding gas costs after Berlin - access lists create opportunity for gas golfing but are
primarily about making sure no contracts get bricked when eip2929 makes state access opcodes more
expensive
• OpenZeppelin Wizard : tell it what you want and it generates Solidity for you
• Testing and using custom hooks with Usedapp
• A complete guide to full stack Eth dev using React, Ethers.js, and Hardhat
Security/incidents
• A solution to swap , the most difficult problem from Paradigm’s CTF. You need to overflow memory in
the mint function.
• Fei vulnerability from faulty minting logic
Ecosystem
• More attacks on frontrunning bots : special behavior for flashbots address, making the token pay the
miner, or freezing the tokens of bots who insta-buy a new Uniswap listing . It appears that all the
attacks on bots have led to bots turning off and gas prices going down to ~65 gwei.
• 58% of hashrate now on Flashbots
• ETHmerge.com - an open source community effort to educate about Ethereum turning off proof of work
• Reminder: asset transfer fees are easily avoidable via wrapping
Enterprise
• Miami wants to explore putting real estate titles on Ethereum . If you listen to the podcast, the
audio is better on Youtube
Application layer
• Liquity stablecoin live on mainnet - zero interest loans with only 110% collateralization
• Algo stablecoin Fei has completely lost its peg at the moment. There is a vote to allow redemptions
at $1, but currently the vote is for the status quo
• Kyber dynamic market maker beta is live - fees go up and down with volatility and programmable
pricing curve
• Christie’s to auction nine CryptoPunks
• WWE is selling Undertaker NFTs , chess world champion Magnus Carlsen is selling NFTs of his games
• GnosisAuction for token launches with frontrunning resistance via batch auctions
• 73 Dai PoolTogether deposit wins ~$44k
• 1inch Network . 1inch adds a DAO, Foundation, and Labs to the dex aggregator and liquidty pools
• New TornadoCash pools : Dai 100, 1k, 10k, 100k. cDAI : 5k, 50k, 500k, 5m. wBtc : 0.1, 1, 10
• Compound is the first protocol over $10b TVL per Defipulse, with DeFi TVL over $50b
Regulation/business/tokens
• Paris Hilton: why I’m excited about NFTs
• Tom Brady is launching an NFT company
• Mark Cuban: ETH will dwarf BTC
General
• Facebook phone numbers searchable in haveibeenpwned
• CLR fund round 5 is live , matching but with MACI privacy using SNARKs
Job Listings
• Element Finance , launching very soon, is hiring a Solidity engineer
• Nomic Labs (Hardhat/Buidler) is hiring a senior dev and an engineering manager
• Junior devs: Nethermind is looking for junior Solidity, data analysts, nodeJs devs
• Status is hiring! Eng Lead - Go , Snr Go Developer , see our jobs page
• Join Tellor. Backend/solidity/marketing/community - tellor.io/jobs
Want your job listing here ? $345 per line (~75 character limit including spaces), payable in ETH (or
345 DAI or 345 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions? thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,” then please put it on
an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you’re interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Twitter: follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked are. Follow @evan_van_ness to get
most of the week's news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-april-11-2021/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
• April 14 - Berlin upgrade fork (block 12244000)
• April 14 - Coinbase public listing
• April 16 - Rollup community grant applications due
• Apr 16 – May 13 – ETHGlobal’s Scaling Ethereum hackathon
• April 20 - deadline for beacon chain security and testing RFP
• April 20 - deadline to comment on FATF anti-DeFi regulatory proposal
• April 22 - Ethereum in the Enterprise 2021
• May 14 - papers due for WoSCA 2021
• May 14 - Jun 2 - 0xHack
• Jul 20-22 - EthCC4 (Paris)
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
